Package org.wildfly.security.http.oidc

Class Oidc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.http.oidc.Oidc
  • public class Oidc
extends Object
    Constants and utility methods related to the OpenID Connect HTTP mechanism.
    Author:
    Marek Posolda, Farah Juma
